full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### Title
3Y004-230012 - Snowmobiles

#### Tender Reference
WS3830121536-Doc3830130990

#### Amendment
Amendment 2

#### Tender Status
**Tender Closed**

#### Classification
**National Defence; Security and Justice**

#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Polar Knowledge Canada, invites qualified bidders to submit bids for the supply and delivery of snowmobiles for daily operations at the Canadian High Arctic Research Station campus in Cambridge Bay, Nunavut. This tender is restricted to firms registered on the Inuit Firm Registry.

#### Tender Date and Time
* Publication Date: January 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 21, 2023, 14:00 EST

#### Hortification Agreement
This tender complies with the requirements of the Canada Customs and Revenue Agency and the Canada- Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (CUK TCA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

#### Preferred Bidder Criteria
Bidders will be selected on the basis of their ability to supply the required vehicles with the lowest price.

#### End-User Entity
* Polar Knowledge Canada
* Address: 170 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 5V5, Canada

#### Procurement Details
* Region of Supply: Cambridge Bay, Nunavut
* Term of the Contract: February 15, 2023 - March 31, 2023

#### Bidder Contact Information
Should you require further information, please contact:
Kristina McArthur
Email: [kristina.mcarthur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mcarthur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Bidding Instructions
Interested bidders should note the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Canada Buys posting closing time have been superseded by the aforementioned Tender Closing Date. It is the bidder's responsibility ensure timely delivery of the bid submission by the specified date and time. Any bids submitted after 14:00 EST on February 21, 2023, will be declared non-responsive.
